pageProduct.name: Thankyou Shampoo Bar with Chamomile & Rosewater 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

To leave your hair feeling clean and nourished, we’ve put the good stuff into this plant-based shampoo bar. Chamomile and Australian rosewater lovingly help calm and soothe the scalp, while your purchase goes on to help end global poverty. A good hair day and the ability to change the world? What more could you want! MADE WITH LOVE IN AUSTRALIA VEGAN FRIENDLY NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS MADE WITH NO PRODUCT WASTAGE MADE WITH RECYCLED CARDBOARD MADE WITH RECIRCULATED WATER

Warnings

But first, read this Patch test before use. Store below 25°C and in a clean dry place. Keep out of direct sunlight and pooled water. For external use only. Avoid contact with your eyes. If you experience irritation after use, please discontinue.

Common Uses

Shampoo

Ingredients

Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate (Coconut-derived), Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Polyglyceryl-4-Laurate, Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cocamide MEA, Fragrance, Chamomile Flower Extract, Rose Flower Water (Organic), Geranium Oil, Patchouli Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter, Coconut Oil (Organic), Olive Fruit Oil, Hydrolysed Jojoba Esters, Vitamin E, Kaolin, Citric Acid, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Polyquaternium-10, PPG-10 Methyl Glucose Ether, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate.

Directions

The how-to Wet your hair and the shampoo bar, and rub bar in between your hands until you have a lather. Put the bar down and massage shampoo lather into your hair. Rinse, then follow with our life-changing conditioner bar.
